name: search
description: Search Spotify for tracks, albums, artists, or playlists

arguments.name: query
arguments.desc: The search query string

arguments.name: search_type
arguments.desc: The type ('track'|'album'|'artist'|'playlist')

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of results to return

arguments.name: offset
arguments.desc: Index of first item to return

name: play
description: Start playback on the user's active Spotify device

name: pause
description: Pause playback on the user's active Spotify device

name: next_track
description: Skip to the next track

name: previous_track
description: Return to the previous track

name: currently_playing
description: Get a friendly description of the currently playing track

name: play_song
description: Search for a song by name and play the first result

arguments.name: name
arguments.desc: The name of the song to search and play

name: play_by_id
description: Play a track or playlist by Spotify ID or URI

arguments.name: spotify_id_or_uri
arguments.desc: Spotify track or playlist ID/URI

name: list_playlists
description: List user's playlists

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of playlists to return

arguments.name: offset
arguments.desc: Index of first playlist to return

name: list_liked
description: List user's liked songs

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of liked songs to return

arguments.name: offset
arguments.desc: Index of first song to return

name: list_playlist_songs
description: List songs in a playlist by playlist ID

arguments.name: playlist_id
arguments.desc: Spotify playlist ID

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of songs to return

arguments.name: offset
arguments.desc: Index of first song to return

name: add_to_liked
description: Add one or more track IDs/URIs to Liked Songs

arguments.name: song_ids
arguments.desc: Array of Spotify track IDs/URIs

name: add_to_playlist
description: Add one or more track IDs/URIs to a playlist by playlist ID

arguments.name: playlist_id
arguments.desc: Spotify playlist ID

arguments.name: song_ids
arguments.desc: Array of Spotify track IDs/URIs

name: liked_total
description: Return total count of tracks in Liked Songs

name: add_to_queue
description: Add a track to the user's playback queue

arguments.name: track_id
arguments.desc: Spotify track ID or URI to add to queue

name: get_queue
description: Get the user's current playback queue

name: get_recently_played
description: Get the user's recently played tracks

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of tracks to return

name: get_top_tracks
description: Get the user's top tracks

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of tracks to return

arguments.name: time_range
arguments.desc: Time range - 'short_term', 'medium_term', or 'long_term'

name: get_top_artists
description: Get the user's top artists

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of artists to return

arguments.name: time_range
arguments.desc: Time range - 'short_term', 'medium_term', or 'long_term'

name: list_devices
description: List all available Spotify devices

name: transfer_playback
description: Transfer playback to a different device

arguments.name: device_id
arguments.desc: The ID of the device to transfer playback to

name: set_shuffle
description: Set shuffle mode for playback

arguments.name: state
arguments.desc: True to enable shuffle, False to disable

name: set_repeat
description: Set repeat mode for playback

arguments.name: state
arguments.desc: Repeat mode - 'track', 'context', or 'off'

name: seek_position
description: Seek to a position in the current track

arguments.name: position_ms
arguments.desc: Position in milliseconds to seek to

name: set_volume
description: Set the volume for the current playback device

arguments.name: volume_percent
arguments.desc: Volume level from 0 to 100
